rules_text: [i]Corrupt[/i] – Electronic Countermeasures deals 5 damage to target creature. If you control a permanent with mana value 4 or greater, exile the top X cards of your library, where X is the excess damage dealt this way. You may play those cards until your next end step.
notes:
!tokens Memory EIW
art3

This spell deals 5 damage to target creature. Create a number of red Subroutine enchantment tokens named BOOST() with “Whenever this Subroutine runs, add R.” equal to the excess damage dealt this way. (Put each of them into one of your programs.)
